thread.section_title: Journal Reports: Small Business News | Wall Street Journal
thread.title: What Kathryn Minshew, Co-Founder of The Muse, Learned From an Earlier Failure

author: Kathryn Minshew
title: What Kathryn Minshew, Co-Founder of The Muse, Learned From an Earlier Failure
text:
Sometimes you have to learn an achingly difficult lesson the hard way to get where you need to go.
Whenever people ask me what lessons I’ve learned starting and growing The Muse, I’m always tempted to start the story much earlier, when I first learned the importance of resilience.
Seven years ago, I quit my job to focus on my own project full-time:...
